The core gameplay loop is pretty fun, but it's really unforgiving for newer players and there's like so much frustration if you decide to play this game.

Play as a survivor? Oh, you got spotted first and they'll focus your ass like it's the only thing they want and when you realize it you're already hooked thrice early in the game without doing anything. And it's a pretty normal thing to focus on the weaker players first because they'll be easier to chase.

Play as a killer? Oh, they'll keep looping you for minutes and when you had enough and switches to someone else it'll just be the same thing again. Heck they'll often even teabag you after a pallet stun, flashlight spams you just to annoy you, jumpscaring you with head on, the very existence of decisive strike. In the end you'd feel like instead of being a big bad hunter you're just the one being bullied by 4 other people.

Arguably these are just because I'm bad but when this is how my actual couple of first matches looks like, then man is there so much frustrating things in both sides and it makes me wonder why I keep playing. These could also be because the matchmaking is very trash but then fix your damn game then.

Not to mention Behavior's general lack of care for what the community wants fixed and instead just gives dlc and skins. Or even downgrade stuff like the new killer aura, literally can't see a damn survivor if they're even close to a generator with BBQ & Chili... so what did I even buy a damn dlc did. It'll probably get patched soon (i hope) but the fact this came into live at all is just baffling.

Honestly I wish there's like a bot mode or something, or even a damn practice option? Can't even start a custom game alone to practice nurse's blink so I have to suffer through skilled survivor using a killer I can't play that'll just end in postgame "noob killer lmao" hm yeah that's real fun.

Though if you can suffer through that I guess it's still pretty fun, I might just want to believe the game is actually much better when you're better at the game, but we'll see. I'll just put this on a recommendation I guess, I'm really just neutral.

To end the rant in a brighter note: 
I still remember the first time I queued into a Myers, 3 of us was doing gens and suddenly there's a notification the killer is around you so I immediately look around and found someone just standing there looking at us from a distance.. and then he went elsewhere. Not gonna lie that was the spookiest shit I've seen in this game and suddenly he would appear out of nowhere and insta-down you lol. 

Ended up spamming Myers after that and he's pretty fun to play. Oh, that might be why I still play this game.

this game is bullshit first 10 times playing as a killer, in fact ever even playing, as a rank 20 (lowest possible ranking) i get matched against 2 rank 1's (highest) a rank 2, and a rank 5...
how the hell are you supposed to be able to learn to play this when you get paired against the best ranked players possible as the lowest rank player possible, especially when they are all on voip with eachother. This matchmaking system is completely screwed up. Bad design on their part, I wouldn't recommend wasting your time on this.

４対１の逃げる側のサバイバーとそれを追う殺人鬼の、鬼ごっこのような非対称マルチプレイゲームです。
現在バランスがとても悪く、やりこんでいくと追う側の殺人鬼は逃げる側のサバイバーが余程ミスをしない限り負けに等しい評価になります。
そして殺人鬼はとてもサバイバーに馬鹿にされ、マナーも酷く殺人鬼側が勝ったとしても卑怯だとか言われます。

そのため、生存者をやりたい人４人と殺人鬼をやりたい人の1人を集めないとゲームが始まらないといったゲームの性質上、わざわざヤラレ役の鬼をやりたい人が少なく、ゲームが始まるまで殺人鬼役をやってくれる人が来てくれるまでかなり待つ状態です。
ゲームとしては斬新で悪くないのですし良い部分も多いのですが、運営会社がバランスの調整が下手過ぎてサバイバーが有利になる調整しかしないので、殺人鬼はボランティアと揶揄されていますし運営会社は今後は殺人鬼を弱くしていくと明言していますので、廃れていく可能性が高いかもしれませんね。

This game is definitely not worth money spent on it any longer.  Everytime the devs make changes, the game becomes more unplayable.  They are trying to make a competitive game out of something that is A) far too broken and buggy to be competitive and B) is made to be a fun party game.  The new matchmaking system they have recently implemented is trash.  And they continue to try to balance the game around Survive With Friends when in reality, not that many players engage in full 4 man swf.  If you are looking for a game that's fun to play with friends occasionally despite its broken state, spend that cash, but don't buy it expecting a stellar gaming experience.
